name: CV_MSMT_TEXT_GEN
description: Measurement text generation data from RES records.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the finding record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ADDED_COMPONENT_ID
columns.description: LRR ID of a measurement added to the text generation for a form.
